attributes.action: New icons for the new banknotes
attributes.additional_details: Please instruct the Bank of England to use modern, inspirational Britons on the new plastic banknotes. I suggest that England's greatest living poet, John Cooper-Clarke, should feature on the £20 note, Andy Murray on the £10 (unless Scotland votes for independence next year, in which case Sir Bradley Wiggins), Harry from One Direction on the £5 and Nigella Lawson on the £50.
